接口 cn.sharesdk.onekeyshare.ShareContentCustomizeCallback
的使用

  • 使用ShareContentCustomizeCallback的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    cn.sharesdk.demo  
    cn.sharesdk.onekeyshare  

    • cn.sharesdk.demo中ShareContentCustomizeCallback的使用

      实现ShareContentCustomizeCallback的cn.sharesdk.demo中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  ShareContentCustomizeDemo
      OnekeyShare allows you to customize share content according to the target platform by implements ShareContentCustomizeCallback and override its #onShare(Platform, ShareParams) method This demo defines a callback to shorten share content of Twitter.

    • cn.sharesdk.onekeyshare中ShareContentCustomizeCallback的使用

      返回ShareContentCustomizeCallback的cn.sharesdk.onekeyshare中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ShareContentCustomizeCallback OnekeyShare.getShareContentCustomizeCallback()
      returns share content customizing callback
      参数类型为ShareContentCustomizeCallback的cn.sharesdk.onekeyshare中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void OnekeyShare.setShareContentCustomizeCallback(ShareContentCustomizeCallback callback)
      setting the share content customizing callback for sharing process
      void ShareCore.setShareContentCustomizeCallback(ShareContentCustomizeCallback callback)
      add a customize share content callback which will be involved before the target platform sharing
